text: Is there a social signup/login for forms?

Nothing official... but there are a few folks who have pulled together work arounds for it.
Ex: <https://w.inboundlabs.co/booya>

:point_up_2:
This is what we're using on <https://designers.HubSpot.com/code-gallery> with GitHub oAuth
(<http://InboundLabs.co|InboundLabs.co> volunteered to develop the Code Gallery for us)
